Text: Victory Capital Management Inc. raised its stake in shares of Customers Bancorp by 10.9% during the first quarter. Victory Capital Management Inc. now owns 40,029 shares of the bank's stock valued at $733,000 after acquiring an additional 3,942 shares during the last quarter.
